Text: Thanks to ConvertXtoDVD I can now watch movies like this.  Thank you...
thanks to ConvertXtoDVD im sure to have a nice virus on my computer. fucking cock

Why would it be ConcertXtoDVD's fault you have a virus? On the other hand, why would you need it to watch an .avi movie? It's one of many ways you could get a virus potentially, and one of even more ways to watch a movie.
